title: New loading page
body:
I thought this loading screen would look amazing and i feel like we need a new one anyways. I found this on FB, not my idea.

https://fbcdn-sphotos-c-a.akamaihd.net/hphotos-ak-xfa1/v/t1.0-9/10635723_854929401218483_7035273069424335478_n.jpg?oh=14c0392b891a580ba9f77a993bc18b11&oe=55180718&__gda__=1426265390_2e635372600acb8cbfb5641b1d892e6d

replies.body:
How my answer is. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PLbV4tl9n20

"You want a treat?"
"{{champion:157}}"
Lol.
Tiny problem here. During the loading phase i usually go to the bathroom or do something else. Don't want my team to get mad at me for not communicating.
just tell them that
ok ;(

How about some loading screen music?Have it be like elevator music.
Something simple & easy to loop (we know people will have some long loading sometimes)
Yes,people should be allowed to adjust the volume.

EDIT:Additionally,the song should fade out as the game is about to start.As a signal to get ready.
most players turn off music cause its a distraction and hides audio cues. So most people would not benfiet from loading music. Also league music gets annoying after the 7 th time hearing it.

I have my own music I listen to that I turn on as soon as Champ Select ends, and I'm sure many others do. It'd be greatly unfortunate to not be able to turn on your own music until load screen ends, especially for those long load screens.

I said you should have the option to adjust the volume (aka mute it if you don't want to hear it),so where's the problem?
Just play your music over it.It should be soft elevator music,not loud hardcore heavy metal.If it's still too loud,then turn it down or mute it.Problem solved.

I mean,people listens to music during the game.That didn't stop Riot from updating the SR music then leaving the option to change it back to the old SR music.
You've got a point there. Alright, shut up and take my like.
now this idea is pretty awesome RIOT PLEASE
Chat while loading should be a thing.
Oh yeah, I would love it if the loading screen could be used for extra time to talk about strategy. How it is right now, people use the loading time for restroom breaks.
Visual sprucing up of the loading page would be nice, but a pregame chat would be *amazing*.
Might have to turn the graphics down a bit, or else people with older computers (coughcough*me*coughcough) would never get into a game. But the team chat idea is really smart
The graphics shouldn't really take that much more computing power because most of it's essentially static images.

> Might have to turn the graphics down a bit, or else people with older computers (coughcough*me*coughcough) would never get into a game. But the team chat idea is really smart

A nicer static image doesn't take longer to load than an ugly / plainer one :P

I don't think the team chat idea is good though. In theory, it's something everybody would want. But when your computer starts acting up you will have to deal with "Nice toaster" "You should upgrade to a Microwave" and other unoriginal jokes.
Since during the loading screen you don't have any way of talking and are more likely to forget by the time you go in game.

Did your computer start to choke when you clicked on the image?

If yes: Your computer can't play League (if you're running linux, start your UI and try again)

If no: Your computer would not notice the difference between this and what's running currently, with the exception of the chat.

Good idea, but take away the part where you can see the other teams connection. I remember how annoying it was when they had that and the enemy team saw who had the worst connection, and would mess with them the entire game :((

I liked it when other teammates could see your lag and also tell others if they should look out for problems. I would like my teammates to know if I were having problems so they can act accordingly. 

The only trouble with this, though I like it, it might make load-ins longer; since it will take some internet to chat or see someone else chat.

If I may squeeze a 'lil Shulk time into this...

I'm really feeling it!
get some HW done while loading

seems nice and all but might provoke toxicity because of "chat". arguments may start here or continue from champion pick to loading screen and might probably lead to more leavers or trolls. idk. but then again looking at the positive side, you can prolly talk a bit to your team about plans/strategies against the other team's comp  or w/e during loading since everyone's idle and doing nothing but watching cat vids or reading e-mail or other stuff.

looks nice though.

Chat arguments that would start here most likely already started in champ select...its sad but we all know its true. But for the rare occasion that no A-Holes are present, a chance to work out strategies and lane swaps when you first get to see their summoner spells is a huge boon. IDFK if they change anything else on the loading screen, although i do think the image here is really sharp, but the team chat needs to happen...besides youre stuck there for almost 5 minutes on average so let us work out some stuff before the game starts so we arent talking while the enemy is warding our jungle....{{summoner:11}}
great idea looks great
I would like even better if the game loaded in the background and we could still browse the store or our masteries etc while it was loading.
Need this more than the usual boring black screen we have in the background.
my friends and I have definitely discussed the need of chat during load screen.  would be so nice.
of course, that specific layout does cater to those with wide monitors.  would look crappy on old monitors.

This is amazing!

This would be a change I'd actually be glad to see...

OMG DIS IS AWESOME I LUV THE CHAT TOO
but dont show dc ppl... only to ur own team or else it will be unfair
Ohhh yes. I want this. Make a specific background for each map. And let's put "Summoning" back when you've loaded to 100%. YES WE SUMMONERS EXIST AND FOREVER WILL. Also seeing team pings, please.

Not totally into it.  I enjoy the team chat feature, and the ui itself is pretty nice, but the background is too bright for me.  I'd prefer if it didn't draw as much attention from the champions themselves.
backrounds too bright, scrap the idea, couldnt possibly work now XD lmao

> backrounds too bright, scrap the idea, couldnt possibly work now XD lmao

When did I say that?  How could you read my mind?!

Many people have noted that this will increase loading times for some. Maybe make an option to disable loading screen chat? 

I've been in the position where my only option was to play LoL on a my toaster and for sure my loading times were high.
I've since gotten an upgrade and run league perfectly, but it know a chat box while on my toaster would have maybe toasted the toaster.

Agreed, the amount of times my team's chat that gets cut off from load screen is annoying.  Keeping that team momentum and bond through to the load screen would be powerful to many teams in solo queue.
people still are posting this loadscreen when rito wont care -_-
This is actually amazing
I hope it carries chat over from the champion select screen and into the game time itself. I know I hate it when a message gets typed into chat and then the entire screen vanishes.

I really think you should also be able to click on a champion and see the text of its abilities. For a lot of people it would let them get a refresher on how to fight a certain champion.

 It would also be a **BIG **deal for beginners, and helps them get to the part of the game where they know what they are up against (aka, the fun part of the game).
So clean, crisp.
cool!{{champion:161}} {{item:3089}}
